nodes.text: Yasilor was a world located within the star system of the same name, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Bajic sector. Around the year 10 ABY, it served as the homeworld of the Palkandi Brokerage House, a front organization for the criminal Tenloss Syndicate.

Yasilor was mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, written by Rick D. Stuart for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Yasilor system, and therefore the world Yasilor, in grid square P-17.
